level.text: Except as otherwise provided in this subtitle, an applicant applying for a license to practice as a physical therapist assistant shall establish to the satisfaction of the Board that the applicant has successfully completed an educational program in physical therapy appropriate for preparation as a physical therapist assistant, which is accredited by an agency recognized by the Secretary of the Department of Education or the Council of Postsecondary Accreditation.
An applicant shall submit with a completed application an official certified transcript of the applicant’s educational record and a certificate of graduation from the educational institution.
